name: Harper Scout Divine Cleric Archer (Cleric 32 / Harper Scout 5 / Rogue 3)
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
I want to make the Harper Scout useful, and the only way I could think of doing that was by utilising the 2 bonus feats in epic levels for Great Charisma.

Therefore it made sense to me any Harper Scout build, to be useful would be to try to make some sort of Divine Damage Build. I understand the Eagle's Splendor feat from HS stacks with the Eagle's Splendor spell, providing an alternative way of seriously boosting charisma in a similar way to the Paladin's Aura of Glory

Anyway this is a draft of a Harper Scout Divine Cleric Archer type build. Hope you enjoy reading it!
